main_features: Web scraping of Call for Tenders data from the EU website
Database management and storage using PostgreSQL
REST API for accessing scraped data
Real-time monitoring dashboard with automated updates

priority_order.description: Correct the NameError by importing Text from SQLAlchemy

priority_order.task: Implement web scraping functionality with Scrapy
priority_order.description: Develop a scraper for collecting Call for Tenders data from the EU website
Design and implement the SQLAlchemy models for storing scraped data
Implement CRUD operations for managing tasks and convocatorias via a FastAPI endpoint
Create an interactive dashboard to display system status, scraping statistics, and results

corrective_actions.error: Validation Error due to undefined Text in models.py
corrective_actions.solution: Add `from sqlalchemy import Text` at the beginning of models.py

corrective_actions.error: Missing implementation for web scraping functionality
corrective_actions.action: Develop a Scrapy spider to scrape Call for Tenders data
corrective_actions.solution: Create a new Scrapy project and implement a spider to collect data from the EU website
